description:
Dream the quantum dreams, and help us with cutting edge scientific research.

Play this game now, to help us build a real quantum computer.

#### How to play
* Video tutorial, [youtube.com](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ssgZtzr7r4)

#### ScienceAtHome    
* To contribute to our research, make sure you play our games with an active internet connection, as we are gathering data for our scientists based on your performance.
* [Privacy policy](https://www.scienceathome.org/privacy)
summary: Learn about quantum physics and help build quantum computers by playing games
author: ScienceAtHome
